de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Class AbstractImConnectionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection.AbstractImConnectionAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImConnectionAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImcConnectionAdapterIetf, ImvConnectionAdapterIetf

    public class AbstractImConnectionAdapter
extends Object
implements ImConnectionAdapter
    Generic base for an IM(C/V) connection adapter with connection control functions. Especially important for inheritance.
